content.rendered:
About Me

Jun has worked in numerous education establishments over the past fifteen years, where she has been responsible for the management of operations and maximising opportunities for provision. Jun has extensive experience of management and the compliance aspects of delivery and learner support.

Key responsibilities

  • Manage the Registry function;
  • Pearson examinations officer and responsible for certifications across campuses;
  • Responsible for the HND data registry across all campuses.
